text.data: Chapter 4 Full of Regret[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]![end]
Matelite: I, Matelite, captain of the knights of Kahna, have arrived![end]
Taicho: I, Taicho of the knights of Mahal, have also come![end]
Matelite: Alright, [character][0x0]! Do your worst![end]
Soldier: !!![end]
[character][0x1]... My heart is full of regret. I had hoped we would finally find you...[end]
Matelite: Here comes the commander, taking his idle time! Hurry up, [character][0x0]![end]
[character][0x1] was also tortured... That image will not do![end]
A distant, pleasant fragrance...[end]
Taicho: Hurry and introduce me to [character][0x1]![end]
Taicho: Do it however you like, [character][0x0]![end]
I cannot believe that [character][0x0] would torture somebody...[end]
Sendak: [0x2a]gasp[0x2a] [0x2a]pant[0x2a] I will wait here...[end]
Lukia: There must be hordes of enemies outside. Are your battle preparations complete? Wait! Let's go![end1]
Matelite: Hey! Stop shouting![end]
Lukia: I'll wait here too. Sendak looks like he got a little too enthusiastic.[end]
Lukia: Rush is chasing after a Granbelos soldier.[end]
Rush: Sorry... he got away.[end]
Rush: But I brought this guy with me.[end]
Rush: I see.[end]
Battlefield salesman: Hello![end]
Show me weapons. Show me armor. Show me items.[end1]
Uhehehehe... Princess... Hee hee hee...[end]
Soldier: Sorry, General Zomberd! I was daydreaming![end]
Soldier: Who are you?![end]
Soldier: The Resistance?! Please, spare my life![end]
Soldier: What are you going to do me? You're... not gonna torture me, are you? Torture it is! I can't do something like that![end1]
Aah! Stop! I don't like being hurt![end]
Rush: Screw that![end]

Whew... ......
Oh no! You're just toying with me! You're going to, after all![end]
Matelite: What is this? Where is [character][0x1]?![end]
Rush: She isn't here. [character][0x0] is gonna ask this guy about her by torturing him.[end]
Taicho: Excellent idea![end]
Soldier: Please stop! I'll talk! I'll talk! Princess [character][0x1] was taken with Emperor Sauzer![end]
Matelite: But WHERE TO?![end]
Soldier: To the forest to the north! I don't know the details![end]
Matelite: You don't know the details? Lying won't do you any good.[end]
Matelite: Fine. I'll just have to personally show him some real torture.[end]
Rush: Oh no! He's going to call for his friends![end]
Rush: Those Granbelos jerks! Sticking [character][0x1] in a place like this![end]
Rush: Something seems strange up ahead! What should we do, [character][0x0]? You go on ahead! Come back later![end1]
Rush: [0x24]Oh, Rush! You came to save me![0x22] And then I'll hold her tightly in my arms! Sorry, [character][0x0]. Come back later![end]

Rush: You just want her all for yourself, don't you?!
[0x24]Oh, [character][0x0]! You came to save me! I'm so happy![0x22] she'll say, then you'll hold each other's hands... That role is mine![end]
Rush: She isn't here...[end]
Rush: I wonder what this guy knows?[end]
Bikkebakke: I brought the dragons, but it's a little crowded here.[end]
Hey! What happened to, [0x24]Rush... Thank you...[0x22]!?[end]
Rush: [character][0x0]! Where're you going?![end][end]
